function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low level of control functionalities in the majority of domains","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Building lighting control is absent","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No daylight or motion sensors implemented in rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reported information on ev charging capability may lead to unmonitored and unregulated usage, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread through surface contact on ev charging stations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Partial building fault detection process may result in undetected issues with hvac systems, leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited reporting of window and skylight position","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient coverage of relevant heating loads by meters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domestic hot water storage and control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient local electricity production and storage for ev charging","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simultaneous heating and cooling limitations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart grid integration","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient cooling system maintenance leading to poor temperature control and potential discomfort for occupants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of people in healthcare building","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of control over hot water supply","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legislative constraints prevent the storage of locally produced electricity, leading to suboptimal consumption.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity consumption.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on manual control for lighting and dynamic envelope elements may result in suboptimal use of natural light and ventilation, leading to indoor air quality issues and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant heating loads are metered","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No reporting on domestic hot water usage","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing and collaboration between technical managers in healthcare facilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate building maps and characteristics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and auditing of current bacs involves physical interaction with building systems and devices.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of bacs design and functionalities improvements involves on-site work and potential exposure to contagions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex equations and technical language make it difficult for non-experts to understand the risk assessment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation matrix may not capture all relevant impact criteria, leading to incomplete assessment of bacs design and functionalities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within healthcare facilities due to suboptimal building automation and control systems bacs design and functionality.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper auditing and evaluation of building automation and control systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems bacs design and operation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Outdated bacs in healthcare buildings in denmark","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Minimal consideration and evaluation of bacs design and operation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems could lead to design flaws that impact building performance.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for contamination in shared ventilation systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and control of building automation systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of auditing and design evaluation of bacs in smart buildings leading to large energy performance gaps and suboptimal control systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation in healthcare facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient building automation and control system","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multiple parameters comprising the iaq category, leading to non-compliance if one parameter exceeds the relevant threshold.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assessment of thermal comfort, lighting, and iaq compliance only during occupied hours 8am -6pm , and acoustic compliance during unoccupied hours 7pm -7am after the air conditioning system has started.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Samba device unaware of its location, with data packets assigned to a ’zone’ based risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overwhelming background noise level in contemporary sealed-façade office buildings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of national or international guidelines for hcho and tvoc parameters","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exclusion of weekends and public holidays from compliance metrics","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ambiguity in occupancy during ’fringe’ hours 7-8am and 7-8pm","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited availability of historical data through the dashboard may hinder comprehensive analysis of building performance, including the tracking of long-term trends and patterns in indoor environmental quality.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Automatic generation and distribution of weekly reports may lead to complacency among users in conducting their own detailed follow-up diagnostics, potentially overlooking critical issues in indoor environmental quality.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of data quality and
